      • Bit

        @Deprecated
public Bit(int bit)
    throws IllegalArgumentException
        Deprecated. Use valueOf(java.lang.String) to save memory.
        Create a new bit according to the specified integer value. The bit value is 1 for true and 0 for false.
        Parameters:
        bit - 1 for true and 0 for false
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified value is neither 0 nor 1.

        Returns:
        a Bit as defined by the given String expression
